Title: Carcass
Description: "Carcass" project makes it easier creating IDE-like applications similar to Microsoft Visual Studio Shell and SharpDevelop IDE. Its mission is to provide the flexible and extensible infrastructure necessary to create an IDE-based application in WPF with less efforts.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
"Carcass" project makes it easier creating IDE-like applications similar to Microsoft Visual Studio Shell and SharpDevelop IDE. Its mission is to provide the flexible and extensible infrastructure necessary to create an IDE-based application in WPF with less efforts.


More details on the project are to be published soon...
